name: Saint Joseph with the Christ Child
maker: Attributed to Gennaro Laudato, After a model by Giuseppe Sanmartino
description: Saint Joseph with the Christ Child; Attributed to Gennaro Laudato (Italian, active in the 1790s), After a model by Giuseppe Sanmartino (Italian, 1720 - 1793); Naples, Italy; 1790s; Polychrome terraglia (white-bodied, glazed earthenware); 54.3 cm (21 3/8 in.); 91.SE.74; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
